short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AI-powered job application assistant that helps automate and streamline your job search process

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension works exclusively with your OAKI account (oaki.io) to streamline your job application process.

Key Features:
• AI-Assisted Form Filling: Pre-fills job applications using your OAKI-generated, customized responses, and AI-generated resume
• Real-time Control: Review and modify any field before submission
• Multi-Platform Support: Works seamlessly with all major ATS/job boards (and we're adding more every week)
• Progress Tracking: Monitor your application status directly from the extension

How It Works:
1. Start at OAKI (oaki.io) to create or upload your resume and set your job search preferences
2. OAKI then finds and matches you with jobs, and prepares an "app package" for each; including a customized resume, cover letter, and answers to any additional questions in the application
3. From the OAKI app (app.oaki.io), you can launch your prepared jobs one at a time or in batches
4. The extension automatically detects and loads your prepared applications to fill out the forms
5. Review, modify if needed, and submit with confidence

Note: This extension requires an active OAKI account. While the extension itself is free, it relies on OAKI's AI-powered application preparation service. Start with a free trial at https://www.oaki.io.

Privacy & Security:
• Your data is encrypted and secured using Google Cloud infrastructure
• No data is stored locally beyond your current session
• Permissions are limited to job application sites only
• Full compliance with job board terms of service—this is an accessibility enhancement tool only
